body:
This is a pretty large patch (necessarily so, I think). I didn't look through all of it, but from what I've read, I'm concerned about landing this on master without the APIs to match. I think that it will be a better idea to create a feature branch, and land this PR on it, as well as the APIs for filter options and recipe filtering.

The main concern here is that this feature is not ready for production (since it relies on APIs that are not written), and the goal is that master is always ready for production (at least in theory). As naive an idea as that is, I think it is still a good goal to strive for.

Can we recreate this PR to merge into a feature branch instead of master? Or do you think that's a crazy idea?
